Package com.flag4j.core

Class TensorBase<T>

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.core.TensorBase<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the entries of this tensor.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CTensor, MatrixBase, SparseTensorBase, Tensor, VectorBase
public abstract class TensorBase<T> extends Object implements Serializable
A tensor with typed entries.
See Also:

    • sameLength

      public static boolean sameLength​(TensorBase<?> A, TensorBase<?> B, int axis)
      Checks if two matrices have the same length along a specified axis.
      Parameters:
      A - First tensor to compare.
      B - Second tensor to compare.
      axis - The axis along which to compare the lengths of the two tensors.
      Returns:
      True if tensor A and tensor B have the same length along the specified axis. Otherwise, returns false.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If axis is negative or unspecified for the two tensors.
